name: dart-custom-formatter
description: [dev] Customizable Dart formatter, tab indents, custom styles

dart-custom-formatter.enableCustomFormat.markdownDescription: Whether to enable the [dart_formatter] (https://github.com/tekert/dart-formatter) for Dart code.

dart-custom-formatter.doNotFormat.markdownDescription: An array of glob patterns that should be excluded for formatting. The pattern is matched against the absolute path of the file. Use `**/test/**` to skip formatting for all test directories.

dart-custom-formatter.formatterPath.description: The path to a custom Dart Formatter Server. This setting is intended for use by Dart Format Server developers.

dart-custom-formatter.formatterSshHost.description:
An SSH host to run the Formatter Server.
This can be useful when modifying code on a remote machine using SSHFS.

dart-custom-formatter.notifyFormatterErr.description: Whether to show a notification the first few times an Formatter Server exception occurs.

dart-custom-formatter.formatterAdditiona.description: Additional arguments to pass to the Dart Formatter Server. This setting is intended for use by Dart Format Server developers.

dart-custom-formatter.lineLength.description: The maximum length of a line of code. This is used by the document formatter.

dart-custom-formatter.expressionIndent.markdownDescription: The number of spaces in a single level of expression nesting. Defaults to `#editor.tabSize#`

dart-custom-formatter.blockIndent.markdownDescription: The number of spaces in a block or collection body. Defaults to `#editor.tabSize#`

dart-custom-formatter.cascadeIndent.markdownDescription: How much wrapped cascade sections indent. Defaults to `#editor.tabSize#`

dart-custom-formatter.constructorInitial.markdownDescription: The ':' on a wrapped constructor initialization list. Defaults to `#editor.tabSize#`

enumDescriptions: Original Dart Style (with the ability to set custom indent sizes).
An outer braces style based on Dart Style.

dart-custom-formatter.maxLogLineLength.description: The maximum length of a line in the log file. Lines longer than this will be truncated and suffixed with an ellipsis.

dart-custom-formatter.extensionLogFile.description: The path to a low-traffic log file for basic extension and editor issues.

dart.formatterInstrumentationLogFile.description: The path to a log file for very detailed logging in the Dart Formatter Server that may be useful when trying to diagnose Formatter Server issues.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
